summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block "A", Supplemental Plat of block 20, G. Kinnear's Addition, being the alley between Kinnear Place and West Prospect Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 5th Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Petition No. 88468, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
